# Problem 3

## Problem 3(a)

```{=tex}
\colorlet{shadecolor}{orange!20}
\begin{shaded}
```
```{r 3a}
#3a
ggplot(oxygen, aes(x=distance, y=oxygen)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(color= distance), outlier.color= NA, position ="dodge") +
  geom_jitter(position= position_jitter(width= 0.05)) +
  ylab("Oxygen mg/L") +
  ggtitle("Oxygen Content (mg/L) in Mouth of Mississippi") +
  scale_x_discrete(name= "Distance (m)", breaks= oxygen$distance, labels= oxygen$breaks) +
  theme_gray(base_size= 18) +
  theme(legend.position= "none")
```

```{=tex}
\end{shaded} \colorlet{shadecolor}{gray!10}
```
## Problem 3(b)

```{=tex}
\colorlet{shadecolor}{orange!20}
\begin{shaded}
```
```{r 3b}
#3b
oxygen_summary <- oxygen %>%
  group_by(distance) %>%
  summarize(sample_mean=mean(oxygen), sample_sd= sd(oxygen), n=length(oxygen))
oxygen_summary
```

distance 1 mean, sd, n: 2.2, 1.476, 10\
distance 2 mean, sd, n: 4.6, 2.119, 10\
distance 3 mean, sd, n: 21.2, 4.732, 10\
distance 4 mean, sd, n: 31.4, 5.522, 10

```{=tex}
\end{shaded} \colorlet{shadecolor}{gray!10}
```
## Problem 3(c)

```{=tex}
\colorlet{shadecolor}{orange!20}
\begin{shaded}
```
```{r 3c}
#3c
oxygen$distance = as.factor(oxygen$distance)
lm_oxygen <- lm(oxygen ~ distance, data=oxygen)
summary(lm_oxygen)
anova(lm_oxygen)
```

```{=tex}
\end{shaded} \colorlet{shadecolor}{gray!10}
```

```{=tex}
\colorlet{shadecolor}{orange!20}

```
The p-value we get is \<0.05. Because of this, we reject the null hypothesis.

```{=tex}
\end{shaded} \colorlet{shadecolor}{gray!10}
```
